The pure class interface. 
public class LabelExpr
  extends AnnotatedTerm
The abstract syntax of label expression. A label expression describes a statechart-transition.

Version: $Id: LabelExpr.pizza,v 1.1.1.1 1998/09/01 10:51:17 wg Exp $

Guarded(Predicate, Predicate)
A guard/action pair.
Reference(NameAppl)
A reference to a transition name.

A temporal predicate.

Guarded
public case Guarded(Predicate guard,
                    Predicate action);
A guard/action pair.

Parameters:
guard - condition to become valid
action - action to be performed
